attributes.action: Formula One must stay on free to air TV
attributes.additional_details:
We the above signed being F1 fans and mainly BBC licence fee payers,(although anyone worldwide who receives the BBC feeds may sign),demand that action be taken to ensure that future F1 seasons remain on free to air TV in their entirety.
OFCOM must start taking more action against the monopolisation of sport in this country by Rupert Murdoch and SKY TV.
